welcomeMessage.name: Montrer à nouveau le message de bienvenue
welcomeMessage.hint: Activer pour montrer le message de bienvenue au prochain rechargement.

arcanist2.name: Activer la refonte des compétences de l'Arcaniste
arcanist2.hint: Activer la 'refonte de l'Arcanum' comme compétence de classe.

esper.name: Activer les compétences de l'Esper
esper.hint: Activer les compétences 'Don Psychiques' de la classe.

mutant.name: Activer les compétences de la Mutante
mutant.hint: Activer la compétence 'Thérioforme' de la classe et ajouter 'Thérioforme associé' à la fiche de PNJ.

pilot.name: Activer les compétences du Pilote
pilot.hint: Activer le 'Véhicule, le 'Module d'armure', le 'Module d'arme, le 'Module de support' comme compétence de classe, et également la séction véhicule de la fiche de personnage.

welcomeMessage.thankYou: Thank you for using ProjectFU Playtest!
welcomeMessage.explanation: Since not every GM necessarily wants all classes to be available in their game, we added configuration options to enable/disable them. By default every class is disabled, which means if you want to use any of them you have to enable them in the settings first.
welcomeMessage.warning: Please use caution when disabling a class again, because items that refer to those features will become invalid and vanish. Both your browser console and the Foundry 'Support & Issues' dialog will show you errors. This is expected behaviour. To get rid of the errors you need to make sure no items use the class features you want to disable.
